tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dear Dr. Siddharth,
Your patience in addressing our concerns and explaining things in a clear and understandable manner has been immensely helpful. We had a different paediatrician earlier. After visiting you feel much more confident with the health of my kids. 
*** ***** ************ *********** ************ *** ************* **** *****


I thank you from my heart for providing unselfishness and exceptional care to the kids. I would like to mention it here specifically that after consulting you, if we have any questions or queries, you were reachable and really responsive over the phone as well.
May god bless you and keep you in healthy and high spirits always.

Regards,
Aman

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Children's Health,Growth & Development Evaluation / Management,Paediatric care,Child specialists ,
review:
Dear Dr.Siddharth,

We wanted to take a moment to express our deepest gratitude for the exceptional care and attention you have provided so far for both of my kids. Your expertise, compassion, and dedication reflects in your attitude and makes your stand out compared to others.

Your patience in addressing our concerns and explaining things in a clear and understandable manner has been immensely helpful. We have had a different Paediatrician earlier. After visiting you, we kind of felt like you provide care and attention to all the kids like your own.

Your professionalism and genuine care shine through in everything you do, and we feel incredibly fortunate to have you as our family paediatrician.

Thank you for going above and beyond to ensure our kids receives the best possible care. 

With deepest appreciation,

Jyoti

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Paediatric care,Pediatric Vaccinations,Child specialists , Consultation provided for all pediatric disease,
review:
Dr. Siddharth is an experienced pediatrician who loves babies very much. 
We started consulting Dr. Siddharth for our son Reyaansh since he was 13 days old. He was recommended by one of my husband's friend. From the very first day itself Dr.Siddharth has given a warmth in his consultation and was very calm and quiet whenever we had any issues. He tried to solve most of the queries over call itself and only if he feels the baby should be checked before prescribing medicine he calls to visit the clinic. For the past 5 months, we had a very good experience with Dr. Siddharth. Dr. Siddharth has encouraged us for a happy parenting  .

Dr Siddharth is very professional and caring doctor. ********* *** ** *** **** *** you can trust him for your child. 24*7 available. I am first time mother so it was very difficult for me to take care of baby but dr Siddharth made it very easy. His guidance was a big help for me and my husband. Even we called him late night but he always replied very patiently and guided us with proper medication for my kid. Thank you so much.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Siddharth Garg is a great pediatrician; he always gives sufficient time and explains the symptoms, cause and medication in detail. We have had great experience with him.
Moreover the clinic is super clean and is maintained well with friendly staff. Highly recommended.

** ********* ** *** **** ** ** ** ********* ************** friendly,comforting and caring. This is our first child and our very first visit with a pediatrician, we were very impressed with him...Our experience is simply amazing..
We know that our baby is in best hands..
Thankyou for all you do!
Thankyou for taking such a great care of kiddos..

Every parents want that paediatrician for their kid should be knowledgable and friendly enough to discuss child's things every now and then and whenever. Dr Sidharth is one of them, always ready to serve you in a best possible way. He guides about the proper care and upbringing of your child. So I would highly recommend Dr Sidharth as a first and only doctor for your child.
My son was unable to digest the food for last 16 hours. Doctor thoroughly checked my child and explained that remedies very well. A highly positive person with friendly way of explanation.
